about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Conscientious, results-driven, articulate and analytical software engineer with several years’ exposure in data-driven software engineering teams; primarily focusing on backend and systems development of large-scale distributed systems. Strong in architectural research, software design and agile team management, having served as a tech lead at multiple companies.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Interested in challenging technical roles in scaling distributed web applications.

items.title: Blah Technologies
items.subtitle: Role  •  Location  • Dates
attributes: Involved in the development and maintenance of the company’s 2 main products in the IOT industry: Nixplay Frames and Nixplay Signage Frames.
Containerized all of the company's microservices for development and deployment using Docker with orchestration handled by AWS Elastic Container Service.

paragraphs: Worked primarily with JavaScript, Python and C++, with frameworks such as Express.js, Koa.js, React.js, Django and Flask.
Interested in functional programming and serverless architectures, exploring with Erlang and AWS Lambda respectively.
